verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Belshazzar <S%H1112><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me, <S%H1840><s%> even to me, Daniel, after <S%H310><s%> that which appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me at the first. <S%H8462><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the vision; <S%H2377><s%> now it was so, <S%H7200><s%> that when I saw, I was in the citadel <S%H1002><s%> of Susa, <S%H7800><s%> which is in the province <S%H4082><s%> of Elam; <S%H5867><s%> and I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the vision, <S%H2377><s%> and I was by the river <S%H180><s%> Ulai. <S%H195><s%>

Then I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H5975><s%> there stood before <S%H6440><s%> the river <S%H180><s%> a <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> which had two horns: <S%H7161><s%> and the two horns <S%H7161><s%> were high; <S%H1364><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> was higher <S%H1364><s%> than the other, <S%H8145><s%> and the higher <S%H1364><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> last. <S%H314><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> pushing <S%H5055><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and northward, <S%H6828><s%> and southward; <S%H5045><s%> and no animals <S%H2416><s%> could stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H5337><s%> neither was there any who could deliver out of his hand; <S%H3027><s%> but he did <S%H6213><s%> according to his will, <S%H7522><s%> and magnified himself. <S%H1431><s%>

As I was considering, <S%H995><s%> behold, <S%H5795><s%> a male goat <S%H6842><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the west <S%H4628><s%> over the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth, <S%H776><s%> and didn't <S%H5060><s%> touch the ground: <S%H776><s%> and the goat <S%H6842><s%> had a notable <S%H2380><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> between his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

He came <S%H935><s%> to the ram <S%H352><s%> that had <S%H1167><s%> the two horns, <S%H7161><s%> which I saw <S%H7200><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the river, <S%H180><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> on him in the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his power. <S%H3581><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> him come <S%H5060><s%> close to <S%H681><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and he was moved with anger <S%H4843><s%> against him, <S%H5221><s%> and struck the ram, <S%H352><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> horns; <S%H7161><s%> and there was no power <S%H3581><s%> in the ram <S%H352><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; <S%H7993><s%> but he cast him down to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and trampled <S%H7429><s%> on him; <S%H5337><s%> and there was none who could deliver the ram <S%H352><s%> out of his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The male <S%H6842><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself exceedingly: <S%H3966><s%> and when he <S%H6842><s%> was strong, <S%H6105><s%> the great <S%H1431><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> was broken; <S%H7665><s%> and instead of it there came up <S%H5927><s%> four <S%H702><s%> notable horns toward the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%>

Out of one <S%H259><s%> of them came forth <S%H3318><s%> a little <S%H4704><s%> horn, <S%H7161><s%> which grew exceeding <S%H3499><s%> great, <S%H1431><s%> toward the south, <S%H5045><s%> and toward the east, <S%H4217><s%> and toward the glorious land. <S%H6643><s%>

It grew great, <S%H1431><s%> even to the army <S%H6635><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> and some of the army <S%H6635><s%> and of the stars <S%H3556><s%> it cast down <S%H5307><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and trampled on them. <S%H7429><s%>

Yes, <S%H1431><s%> it magnified itself, <S%H8269><s%> even to the prince of the army; <S%H6635><s%> and it took away <S%H7311><s%> from him the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H4349><s%> and the place of his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> was cast down. <S%H7993><s%>

The army <S%H6635><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> over to it together with the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering through disobedience; <S%H6588><s%> and it cast down <S%H7993><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and it did its pleasure <S%H6213><s%> and prospered. <S%H6743><s%>

Then I heard <S%H8085><s%> a <S%H259><s%> holy one <S%H6918><s%> speaking; <S%H1696><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> holy one <S%H259><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to that certain <S%H6422><s%> one who spoke, <S%H1696><s%> How long shall be the vision <S%H2377><s%> concerning the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H6588><s%> and the disobedience that makes desolate, <S%H8074><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> both the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the army <S%H6635><s%> to be trodden under foot? <S%H4823><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H505><s%> To two thousand and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> evenings <S%H6153><s%> and mornings; <S%H6944><s%> then shall the sanctuary be cleansed. <S%H6663><s%>

It happened, <S%H1840><s%> when I, even I Daniel, had seen <S%H7200><s%> the vision, <S%H2377><s%> that I sought <S%H1245><s%> to understand <S%H998><s%> it; <S%H5975><s%> and behold, there stood before me as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man. <S%H1397><s%>

I heard <S%H8085><s%> a man <S%H120><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> between the banks of the Ulai, <S%H195><s%> which called, <S%H7121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Gabriel, <S%H1403><s%> make this <S%H1975><s%> man to understand <S%H995><s%> the vision. <S%H4758><s%>

So he came <S%H935><s%> near <S%H681><s%> where I stood; <S%H5977><s%> and when he came, <S%H935><s%> I was frightened, <S%H1204><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face: <S%H6440><s%> but he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H995><s%> Understand, son <S%H1121><s%> of man; <S%H120><s%> for the vision <S%H2377><s%> belongs to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end. <S%H7093><s%>

Now as he was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me, <S%H7290><s%> I fell into a deep sleep with my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground; <S%H776><s%> but he touched <S%H5060><s%> me, <S%H5975><s%> and set me upright. <S%H5977><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H3045><s%> I will make you know what shall be in the latter time <S%H319><s%> of the indignation; <S%H2195><s%> for it belongs to the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time of the end. <S%H7093><s%>
The ram <S%H352><s%> which you saw, <S%H7200><s%> that had <S%H1167><s%> the two horns, <S%H7161><s%> they are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Media <S%H4074><s%> and Persia. <S%H6539><s%>

The rough <S%H8163><s%> male goat <S%H6842><s%> is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Greece: <S%H3120><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> that is between his eyes <S%H5869><s%> is the first <S%H7223><s%> king. <S%H4428><s%>

As for that which was broken, <S%H7665><s%> in the place where four <S%H702><s%> stood up, <S%H5975><s%> four <S%H702><s%> kingdoms <S%H4438><s%> shall stand up <S%H5975><s%> out of the nation, <S%H1471><s%> but not with his power. <S%H3581><s%>

In the latter time <S%H319><s%> of their kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> when the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> have come to the full, <S%H8552><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> dark sentences, <S%H2420><s%> shall stand up. <S%H5975><s%>

His power <S%H3581><s%> shall be mighty, <S%H6105><s%> but not by his own power; <S%H3581><s%> and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> wonderfully, <S%H6381><s%> and shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> and do his pleasure; <S%H6213><s%> and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the mighty <S%H6099><s%> ones and the holy <S%H6918><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

Through his policy <S%H7922><s%> he shall cause craft <S%H4820><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and he shall magnify <S%H1431><s%> himself in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> and in their security <S%H7962><s%> shall he destroy <S%H7843><s%> many: <S%H7227><s%> he shall also stand up <S%H5975><s%> against the prince <S%H8269><s%> of princes; <S%H8269><s%> but he shall be broken <S%H7665><s%> without <S%H657><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The vision <S%H4758><s%> of the evenings <S%H6153><s%> and mornings <S%H1242><s%> which has been told <S%H559><s%> is true: <S%H571><s%> but seal up <S%H5640><s%> the vision; <S%H2377><s%> for it belongs to many <S%H7227><s%> days to come. <S%H3117><s%>

I, <S%H1840><s%> Daniel, fainted, <S%H1961><s%> and was sick <S%H2470><s%> certain days; <S%H3117><s%> then I rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s business: <S%H4399><s%> and I wondered <S%H8074><s%> at the vision, <S%H4758><s%> but none understood it. <S%H995><s%>
